nodes.text: It’s a tragedy and an outrage that we continue to see Black Americans killed by law enforcement. It’s even more heartbreaking to lose Daunte Wright at the same time that Derek Chauvin is on trial for the murder of George Floyd. https://t.co/ODbENv9GXH
@GovDanMcKee Here's a picture of the thug you are supporting. https://t.co/RpxnDoOcCx
@anjin1865 @GovDanMcKee Or how about we teach our youth to not fight against police?????????????
@BenRuss18637225 @anjin1865 @GovDanMcKee Bingo
@GovDanMcKee What steps are you going to take to root out systemic racism in Rhode Island?
@meredith_parish @GovDanMcKee How can he take steps against something that doesn’t exist ??

@GovDanMcKee I wanted to give you a chance but you are starting to lose me w/ your pandering 4 reelection Tell black people that choose not to follow law not to resist arrest & give police respect even if police officer is rude. I will bet, going out on a limb here, that they won’t get shot
@2a4aReason @BenRuss18637225 @GovDanMcKee Oh I love research, it's part of what I do for a job! Research taught me all about how to evaluate numbers and proportions. How about you?
@PhadesM @2a4aReason @GovDanMcKee So minorities are too dumb to make good decisions as well as get an id to vote? I don’t believe that.
@BenRuss18637225 @PhadesM @GovDanMcKee With due respect, none of this has anything to do with my comment about whites being shot by cops more often than blacks are.

@BenRuss18637225 @2a4aReason @GovDanMcKee Yay good, I don't either! So we've ruled out differences in decision making and intelligence as the culprits. I still think it's systematic oppression that drives those numbers. What about you?

@PhadesM @2a4aReason @GovDanMcKee I have been poor and unemployed, it never made me commit violence on anyone. Time to start telling the truth and giving people a pass because of their circumstance.  And if you want to blame someone for their circumstance look left
@BenRuss18637225 @2a4aReason @GovDanMcKee Poverty, lack of access to support resources, systematic oppression and increased liklihood of victimization. Why? What's your answer?
@PhadesM @2a4aReason @GovDanMcKee Then why are more homicides committed by blacks than any other race?
@PhadesM @2a4aReason @GovDanMcKee https://t.co/QyoQYFV8WK
@BenRuss18637225 @PhadesM @GovDanMcKee I was only speaking to police shootings.

@GeorgeWPratt @GovDanMcKee So he had a history of violence, this rightly puts police on high alert, when he doesn’t comply they assume the worst outcome based on his history. Same goes for black white or purple

@GovDanMcKee We can do more. The use of traffic cameras to minimize traffic stops is a great way to bring the tension down and traffic fatalities down. They work great in Providence a d Pawtucket. Let’s expand them. Let’s redeploy police officers and take the bias out of traffic stops.
@meredith_parish @GovDanMcKee There is no systemic racism, don’t let these clowns divide us.
@2a4aReason @GovDanMcKee ....Did you know there are more white people in this country than black people? 🙄
@GovDanMcKee LMFAO....is he wearing a mask in his profile pic. CLOWN
@PierreBeaureg17 @GovDanMcKee I'm done\n✌🏻️
@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee Okay. This is usually how it ends.
@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee Can you teach me what murder is?
@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee I don't think it is reasonable behavior. Same way I don't think speeding is reasonable behavior. Or stealing. I just don't think you should get killed for it.
@PierreBeaureg17 @GovDanMcKee Right... https://t.co/if8qUhLxP0
@PierreBeaureg17 @GovDanMcKee ....then you'd be wrong
@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee Shooting someone and then that person dies I guess?
@PierreBeaureg17 @GovDanMcKee Define murder
@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee I am glad that we agree that resisting arrest should not be met with murder.
@PierreBeaureg17 @GovDanMcKee Murder = 🚫\n....legal use of force 👌🏻 https://t.co/zluHeZEL0R

@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee I guess I thought you were talking about Duante Wright because your response was to Governor McKee's tweet about Duante Wright.\n\nYour argument about Jacob Blake, to be clear, is that resisting arrest and trying to get back into you car should be punished by on-the-spot murder?
Media Release https://t.co/wdq5QaNNyk
@PierreBeaureg17 @GovDanMcKee Who said I was talking about DW?\n\n...but if you think that's a smart idea, go ask Jacob Blake about resisting and jumping back into a car
@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee All apologies, I thought he was trying to get back into his car.
@PierreBeaureg17 @GovDanMcKee ...try reaching for the LEO'S firearm while resisting and get back to me
@gee_savvy @GovDanMcKee I imagine it is something like "not punishable by murder."
@GovDanMcKee What's your stance on resisting arrest?
@GovDanMcKee Well, the idiots have voiced their opinions here.  Thank you,  governor,  for taking this stance.
@meredith_parish @GovDanMcKee “Systemc Racism” theory  is a big pile of horse manure..
@GovDanMcKee I’m ashamed to admit that I live in RI when our Governor stoops to this new low in politics. Next McKee will be talking abt Jim Crow.
@GovDanMcKee Blink thrice if BLM Inc. is holding you hostage.
@GovDanMcKee Keep fueling the commie narrative.
